description:
Udemy's #1 course on Visio! Enroll today and find out why.

Fully updated for the most recent version of Office, Microsoft Visio Like a Boss is a comprehensive video lecture course that takes student from complete newbie to guru with Microsoft's diagramming and flowcharting tool that's used in companies big an small throughout the world

In other words, students will be able to use Visio ... like a Boss.

Whether creating a first Visio diagram, or a veteran looking for new understanding of the applications capabilities, author and Microsoft Certified Instructor Brian Culp will give students a guided tour of the application's newest, most commonly used, and most powerful features.

Students of this course will learn:

  • how to add and manage shapes in a diagram
  • how to import and manage shape stencils
  • how to add and edit text in shapes
  • connect and group shapes
  • create flowcharts, floor plans, and org charts
  • document business processes
  • link Visio with external data sources
  • create custom Visio shapes
  • and much, much more

What's more, students will learn the Visio application by doing. By simply following along with the hands-on exercises, viewers will be able to start from scratch. They will create and edit Visio shapes, text, and connectors to build out diagrams - all without the need to download course or demo files.

You'll use the application just like you would at work or at school. So don't get frustrated fumbling around when it's so easy to learn the right way to use Visio.

The course includes roughly 7 hours of video instruction, delivered in more than 100 individual, bite-sized lessons, making it perfect for learning the application from the ground up, or for going back to review/refresh on a specific skill.

What's more, the results are guaranteed!

You'll have a better understanding of projects and Microsoft Visio than ever before, or your money back. If you need to learn Visio, and need to learn it fast, please enroll or watch a couple of sample lessons - there are no side effects. :)
title: Visio 2013/2016/365 - Like a Boss. The Definitive Course.
